elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Which business transactions could have led to the specified postings? Enter one possible business case in each case.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Bank/Cash desk
elements.correctAnswer: Deposit cash into your own bank account.

elements.title: Ford. L+L/GoodsE

elements.name: question3
elements.title: RoomA/Bank
elements.correctAnswer: Rent is paid by bank transfer.
